status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Over this 6‑hour window the turbine stayed in Normal Operation for all 37 ten‑minute intervals, with relatively steady production (power_mean 0.159, power_std 0.057) under generally moderate winds (wind_speed_mean 5.72, wind_speed_std 0.67). Operationally, rotor and generator speeds were fairly stable (rotor_rpm_std 0.53; generator_rpm_std 59.68) with a consistent average pitch setting (pitch_mean −1.45) and a notable average yaw misalignment of 12.6°. Anomalies are limited to a single extreme wind_speed_max of 25.8 and a sustained negative power residual on average (−0.077), while temperature remained steady around 50.0.
